problem.markdown:
A rectangular pool 24 feet long, 8 feet wide, and 4 feet deep is filled with water. Water is leaking from the pool at the rate of 0.40 cubic feet per minute. At this rate, how many hours will it take for the water level to drop 1 foot?

= 8 [explanation]
